name: AZURN International
overview: Azurn International Limited, an information and communication technology company, engages in the software development and digital publishing businesses in Australia, India, Singapore, the United Kingdom, and the United States. The company develops Multimedia Convergence Platform, which enables the delivery of voice, data, and video to various wired, wireless, and broadband connected devices; and connects business applications to enable voice and data access and interactivity. Its multimedia conferencing switch allows telecommunications carriers, Internet service providers, and medium to large companies to manage their communications in-house, which include audio and Web integrated conferencing, voice over IP, and IP video and broadcasting. The company also provides digital content management solutions, including information transformation, digital conversion, composition, hosting, distribution, and publishing to the publishing industry. Azurn International Limited is headquartered in Melbourne, Australia.
